Select accessibility options

Select accessibility settings as required to find a setup you like. Once the appearance of the page is satisfactory, click on the "Save" button to apply the settings to the entire website. This saves the settings in a cookie on your device which is only used for this purpose and does not store any personal data.

The colour options here are not compatible with the dark-mode toggle in the header bar. If a custom dark scheme is desired, the appropriate colours can be selected in light-mode.

If the dark-mode toggle in the header bar is used after saving Accessibility settings, it will toggle the color settings between the fixed light-mode and dark-mode color schemes. Saved settings can be restored by returning to this page.

Switch to Light Mode

Accessibility settings can only be managed in light mode. Click the button below to start managing these settings.

Restore Accessibility Settings

When the light-mode/dark-mode toggle button is used, the preset color options will take precedence for the remainder of the current session. Any saved accessibility settings will be restored if you start a new session. If you wish to restore them now, click the button below.
